title: It Burns Us (6U110)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Spot Sam and Smeagol (or Gollum) to choose an opponent who must reveal his or her hand. Wound a minion X times, where X is the number of different cultures revealed.
Lore:	”'No more than you deserve.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	This card counts both Free Peoples cultures and Shadow cultures when cards are revealed.
